00013 /*********************** IPX HEADER ROUTINES *************************/
00014 
00015 /* Number of bytes in header elements */
00016 #define IPX_SHORT 2
00017 #define IPX_UINT 4
00018 #define IPX_FLOAT 4
00019 
00020 /* Need to read in element-by-element due to byte packing */
00021 int ipx_read_header(FILE *fd, IPX_header *header)
00022 {
00023   fread(&(header->id), 1, 8, fd);
00024   fread(&(header->size), IPX_UINT, 1, fd);
00025   if(header->size != 286) {
00026     printf("Error: Cannot handle IPX headers not 286 bytes long\n");
00027     return(1);
00028   }
00029   fread(&(header->codec), 1, 8, fd);
00030   fread(&(header->date_time), 1, 20, fd);
00031   fread(&(header->shot), IPX_UINT, 1, fd);
00032   fread(&(header->trigger), IPX_FLOAT, 1, fd);
00033   fread(&(header->lens), 1, 24, fd);
00034   fread(&(header->filter), 1, 24, fd);
00035   fread(&(header->view), 1, 64, fd);
00036   fread(&(header->numFrames), IPX_UINT, 1, fd);
00037   fread(&(header->camera), 1, 64, fd);
00038   fread(&(header->width), IPX_SHORT, 1, fd);
00039   fread(&(header->height), IPX_SHORT, 1, fd);
00040   fread(&(header->depth), IPX_SHORT, 1, fd);
00041   fread(&(header->orient), IPX_UINT, 1, fd);
00042   fread(&(header->taps), IPX_SHORT, 1, fd);
00043   fread(&(header->color), IPX_SHORT, 1, fd);
00044   fread(&(header->hBin), IPX_SHORT, 1, fd);
00045   fread(&(header->left), IPX_SHORT, 1, fd);
00046   fread(&(header->right), IPX_SHORT, 1, fd);
00047   fread(&(header->vBin), IPX_SHORT, 1, fd);
00048   fread(&(header->top), IPX_SHORT, 1, fd);
00049   fread(&(header->bottom), IPX_SHORT, 1, fd);
00050   fread(header->offset, IPX_SHORT, 2, fd);
00051   fread(header->gain, IPX_FLOAT, 2, fd);
00052   fread(&(header->preExp), IPX_UINT, 1, fd);
00053   fread(&(header->exposure), IPX_UINT, 1, fd);
00054   fread(&(header->strobe), IPX_UINT, 1, fd);
00055   fread(&(header->board_temp), IPX_FLOAT, 1, fd);
00056   fread(&(header->ccd_temp), IPX_FLOAT, 1, fd);
00057 
00058   return(0);
00059 }
00060 
00061 int ipx_write_header(FILE *fd, IPX_header *header)
00062 {
00063   header->size = 286;
00064 
00065   fwrite(&(header->id), 1, 8, fd);
00066   fwrite(&(header->size), IPX_UINT, 1, fd);
00067   fwrite(&(header->codec), 1, 8, fd);
00068   fwrite(&(header->date_time), 1, 20, fd);
00069   fwrite(&(header->shot), IPX_UINT, 1, fd);
00070   fwrite(&(header->trigger), IPX_FLOAT, 1, fd);
00071   fwrite(&(header->lens), 1, 24, fd);
00072   fwrite(&(header->filter), 1, 24, fd);
00073   fwrite(&(header->view), 1, 64, fd);
00074   fwrite(&(header->numFrames), IPX_UINT, 1, fd);
00075   fwrite(&(header->camera), 1, 64, fd);
00076   fwrite(&(header->width), IPX_SHORT, 1, fd);
00077   fwrite(&(header->height), IPX_SHORT, 1, fd);
00078   fwrite(&(header->depth), IPX_SHORT, 1, fd);
00079   fwrite(&(header->orient), IPX_UINT, 1, fd);
00080   fwrite(&(header->taps), IPX_SHORT, 1, fd);
00081   fwrite(&(header->color), IPX_SHORT, 1, fd);
00082   fwrite(&(header->hBin), IPX_SHORT, 1, fd);
00083   fwrite(&(header->left), IPX_SHORT, 1, fd);
00084   fwrite(&(header->right), IPX_SHORT, 1, fd);
00085   fwrite(&(header->vBin), IPX_SHORT, 1, fd);
00086   fwrite(&(header->top), IPX_SHORT, 1, fd);
00087   fwrite(&(header->bottom), IPX_SHORT, 1, fd);
00088   fwrite(header->offset, IPX_SHORT, 2, fd);
00089   fwrite(header->gain, IPX_FLOAT, 2, fd);
00090   fwrite(&(header->preExp), IPX_UINT, 1, fd);
00091   fwrite(&(header->exposure), IPX_UINT, 1, fd);
00092   fwrite(&(header->strobe), IPX_UINT, 1, fd);
00093   fwrite(&(header->board_temp), IPX_FLOAT, 1, fd);
00094   fwrite(&(header->ccd_temp), IPX_FLOAT, 1, fd);
00095 
00096   return(0);
00097 }

00099 /*********************** IPX READING ROUTINES ************************/
00100 
00101 /* Open an IPX file for reading */
00102 int IPX_read_open(char *filename, IPX_status *status)
00103 {
00104   int i, offset;
00105 
00106   /* Open IPX file */
00107   if((status->fd = fopen(filename, "rb")) == (FILE*) NULL) {
00108     status->header.numFrames = 0;
00109     return(1);
00110   }
00111 
00112   /* Read IPX header */
00113   if(ipx_read_header(status->fd, &(status->header))) {
00114     fclose(status->fd);
00115     status->header.numFrames = 0;
00116     return(2);
00117   }
00118 
00119   /* Allocate memory for list of frames */
00120   status->frames = (IPX_frame*) malloc(sizeof(IPX_frame)*status->header.numFrames);
00121   
00122   /* Read frame headers */
00123   offset = status->header.size;
00124   for(i=0;i<status->header.numFrames;i++) {
00125     if(fseek(status->fd, offset, SEEK_SET)) {
00126       /* Error reading */
00127       fclose(status->fd);
00128       free(status->frames);
00129       status->header.numFrames = 0;
00130       return(2);
00131     }
00132     status->frames[i].offset = offset;
00133     fread(&(status->frames[i].size), sizeof(uint), 1, status->fd);
00134     fread(&(status->frames[i].time), sizeof(double), 1, status->fd);
00135     offset += status->frames[i].size;
00136   }
00137   /* Finished! */
00138   return(0);
00139 }
00140 
00141 /* Read a frame from an IPX file */
00142 int IPX_read_frame(int fnr, TFrame *frame, IPX_status *status)
00143 {
00144   int offset, size;
00145   int i, j, p;
00146   unsigned char *data;
00147   float factor;
00148 
00149   /* JPEG 2000 variables */
00150   opj_dparameters_t parameters; /* decompression parameters */
00151   opj_dinfo_t* dinfo = NULL;    /* handle to a decompressor */
00152   opj_cio_t *cio = NULL;
00153   opj_image_t *image = NULL;
00154 
00155   if(fnr >= status->header.numFrames) {
00156     return(1);
00157   }
00158   
00159   offset = status->frames[fnr].offset + sizeof(uint) + sizeof(double);
00160   if(fseek(status->fd, offset, SEEK_SET)) {
00161     return(2);
00162   }
00163   size = status->frames[fnr].size - sizeof(uint) - sizeof(double);
00164   
00165   /* Allocate memory */
00166   data = (unsigned char*) malloc((size_t) size);
00167   
00168   /* Read data */
00169   if(fread(data, size, 1, status->fd) != 1) {
00170     free(data);
00171     return(2);
00172   }
00173   
00174   /* Decode JP2 image */
00175 
00176   /* set decoding parameters to default values */
00177   opj_set_default_decoder_parameters(&parameters);
00178 
00179   /* get a decoder handle */
00180   dinfo = opj_create_decompress(CODEC_JP2);
00181 
00182   /* setup the decoder decoding parameters */
00183   opj_setup_decoder(dinfo, &parameters);
00184 
00185   /* open a byte stream */
00186   cio = opj_cio_open((opj_common_ptr)dinfo, data, size);
00187 
00188   /* decode the stream and fill the image structure */
00189   image = opj_decode(dinfo, cio);
00190   if(!image) {
00191     opj_destroy_decompress(dinfo);
00192     opj_cio_close(cio);
00193     free(data);
00194     return(3);
00195   }
00196   
00197   /* close the byte stream */
00198   opj_cio_close(cio);
00199   
00200   /* Copy image into TRawFrame structure */
00201 
00202   /* Check frame data is allocated. If not, allocate it */
00203   if(allocate_output(status->header.width, status->header.height, frame)) {
00204     /* Frame is wrong size */
00205     return(4);
00206   }
00207   
00208   factor = (float) ((1 << image->comps[0].prec) - 1);
00209   //factor = (float) ((1 << 16) - 1);
00210 
00211   p = 0;
00212   for(j=0;j<status->header.height;j++) {
00213     for(i=0;i<status->header.width;i++) {
00214       frame->data[i][j] = ((float) image->comps[0].data[p]) / factor;
00215       p++;
00216     }
00217   }
00218 
00219   if(fnr == (status->header.numFrames-1)) {
00220     /* This is the last frame */
00221     frame->last = 1;
00222   }
00223 
00224   /* free remaining structures */
00225   if(dinfo) {
00226     opj_destroy_decompress(dinfo);
00227   }
00228   /* free image data structure */
00229   opj_image_destroy(image);
00230 
00231   free(data);
00232 
00233   frame->time = status->frames[fnr].time;
00234 
00235   return(0);
00236 }
00237 
00238 /* Close an IPX file opened for reading */
00239 int IPX_read_close(IPX_status *status)
00240 {
00241   fclose(status->fd);
00242 
00243   if(status->header.numFrames > 0)
00244     free(status->frames);
00245   status->header.numFrames = 0;
00246   
00247   return(0);
00248 }
00249 
00250 /*********************** IPX WRITING ROUTINES ************************
00251  * When writing, header fields should already be set except:
00252  * - id
00253  * - codec
00254  * - size
00255  * - numFrames
00256  * - width
00257  * - height
00258  * - depth
00259  * Which are overwritten by this code
00260  *********************************************************************/
00261 
00265 void error_callback(const char *msg, void *client_data) {
00266         FILE *stream = (FILE*)client_data;
00267         fprintf(stream, "[ERROR] %s", msg);
00268 }
00272 void warning_callback(const char *msg, void *client_data) {
00273         FILE *stream = (FILE*)client_data;
00274         fprintf(stream, "[WARNING] %s", msg);
00275 }
00279 void info_callback(const char *msg, void *client_data) {
00280         FILE *stream = (FILE*)client_data;
00281         fprintf(stream, "[INFO] %s", msg);
00282 }
00283 
00284 /* Open an IPX file for writing (overwrite) */
00285 int IPX_write_open(char *filename, int precision, IPX_status *status)
00286 {
00287   if((status->fd = fopen(filename, "wb")) == (FILE*) NULL) {
00288     return(1);
00289   }
00290 
00291   /* Write a dummy header - will overwrite when finished */
00292 
00293   status->header.numFrames = 0;
00294   status->header.width = 0;
00295   status->header.height = 0;
00296   status->header.depth = precision;
00297 
00298   strcpy(status->header.id, "IPX 01");
00299   strcpy(status->header.codec, "JP2");
00300 
00301   if(ipx_write_header(status->fd, &(status->header))) {
00302     fclose(status->fd);
00303     return(2);
00304   }
00305   return(0);
00306 }
00307 
00308 /* Add a frame to the end of an IPX file */
00309 int IPX_write_frame(TFrame *frame, IPX_status *status)
00310 {
00311   opj_cparameters_t parameters; /* compression parameters */
00312   opj_image_t *image = NULL;
00313   opj_cinfo_t* cinfo; 
00314   uint codestream_length, datasize;
00315   opj_cio_t *cio = NULL;
00316   opj_image_cmptparm_t cmptparm;
00317   opj_event_mgr_t event_mgr;            /* event manager */
00318   int i, j, p;
00319   float factor;
00320 
00321   if((status->header.height == 0) || (status->header.width == 0)) {
00322     /* Width and height not set yet */
00323     status->header.height = frame->height;
00324     status->header.width = frame->width;
00325   }
00326 
00327   if((status->header.height != frame->height) || 
00328      (status->header.width != frame->width)) {
00329     /* Frame is wrong size */
00330     return(IO_ERROR_SIZE);
00331   }
00332 
00333   /* Setup callbacks */
00334   memset(&event_mgr, 0, sizeof(opj_event_mgr_t));
00335   event_mgr.error_handler = error_callback;
00336   event_mgr.warning_handler = warning_callback;
00337   event_mgr.info_handler = info_callback;
00338 
00339   /* Set default compression parameters */
00340   opj_set_default_encoder_parameters(&parameters);
00341 
00342   /* Create an image structure */
00343   memset(&cmptparm, 0, sizeof(opj_image_cmptparm_t));
00344 
00345   /* Set image parameters */
00346   cmptparm.prec = status->header.depth;
00347   cmptparm.bpp = cmptparm.prec;
00348   cmptparm.sgnd = 0;
00349   cmptparm.dx = parameters.subsampling_dx;
00350   cmptparm.dy = parameters.subsampling_dy;
00351   cmptparm.w = frame->width;
00352   cmptparm.h = frame->height;
00353 
00354   /* Create image */
00355   image = opj_image_create(1, &cmptparm, CLRSPC_GRAY);
00356   if(!image) {
00357     printf("Error: Cannot create image\n");
00358     exit(0);
00359   }
00360 
00361   /* set image offset and reference grid */
00362   image->x0 = parameters.image_offset_x0;
00363   image->y0 = parameters.image_offset_y0;
00364   image->x1 = parameters.image_offset_x0 + 
00365     (cmptparm.w - 1) * parameters.subsampling_dx + 1;
00366   image->y1 = parameters.image_offset_y0 + 
00367     (cmptparm.h - 1) * parameters.subsampling_dy + 1;
00368 
00369   factor = (float) ((1 << cmptparm.prec) - 1);
00370   p = 0;
00371   for(j=0;j<status->header.height;j++) {
00372     for(i=0;i<status->header.width;i++) {
00373       image->comps[0].data[p] = (int) (factor * frame->data[i][j]);
00374       p++;
00375     }
00376   }
00377   image->comps[0].bpp = cmptparm.bpp;
00378 
00379   /* if no rate entered, lossless by default */
00380   if(parameters.tcp_numlayers == 0) {
00381     parameters.tcp_rates[0] = 0;        /* MOD antonin : losslessbug */
00382     parameters.tcp_numlayers++;
00383     parameters.cp_disto_alloc = 1;
00384   }
00385 
00386   /* Get a compressor handle */
00387   cinfo = opj_create_compress(CODEC_JP2);
00388 
00389   /* catch events using our callbacks and give a local context */
00390   //opj_set_event_mgr((opj_common_ptr)cinfo, &event_mgr, stderr);       
00391 
00392   /* setup the encoder parameters using the current image and using user parameters */
00393   opj_setup_encoder(cinfo, &parameters, image);
00394 
00395   /* open a byte stream for writing */
00396   /* allocate memory for all tiles */
00397   if((cio = opj_cio_open((opj_common_ptr)cinfo, NULL, 0)) == NULL) {
00398     printf("Error: could not open CIO buffer\n");
00399     exit(0);
00400   }
00401 
00402   /* encode the image */
00403   if(!opj_encode(cinfo, cio, image, NULL)) {
00404     opj_cio_close(cio);
00405     return(IO_ERROR_OTHER);
00406   }
00407   /* Length of JP2 code stream */
00408   codestream_length = cio_tell(cio);
00409   /* Length of header + JP2 data */
00410   datasize = codestream_length + sizeof(uint) + sizeof(double);
00411 
00412   /*
00413   printf("Writing frame %d at position %ld, size %d\n", 
00414          status->header.numFrames, ftell(status->fd), codestream_length);
00415   */
00416 
00417   /* Write frame header */
00418   //printf("Writing header: %ld, %d ->", ftell(status->fd), sizeof(uint)+sizeof(double));
00419 
00420   fwrite(&datasize, sizeof(uint), 1, status->fd);
00421   fwrite(&(frame->time), sizeof(double), 1, status->fd);
00422   
00423   //printf(" %ld\n", ftell(status->fd));
00424 
00425   /* write the frame data */
00426   fwrite(cio->buffer, 1, codestream_length, status->fd);
00427 
00428   /* Update header */
00429   status->header.numFrames++;
00430   
00431   /* Free memory */
00432   opj_cio_close(cio);
00433   opj_destroy_compress(cinfo);
00434   opj_image_destroy(image);
00435   
00436   return(0);
00437 }
00438 
00439 /* Close a file opened for writing */
00440 int IPX_write_close(IPX_status *status)
00441 {
00442   /* Set right and bottom so consistent with width and height */
00443   status->header.right = status->header.left + status->header.width - 1;
00444   status->header.bottom = status->header.top + status->header.height - 1;
00445 
00446   /* Go to start of file */
00447   if(fseek(status->fd, 0L, SEEK_SET)) {
00448     return(1);
00449   }
00450 
00451   /* Write proper header */
00452   if(ipx_write_header(status->fd, &(status->header))) {
00453     return(2);
00454   }
00455   
00456   /* Close the file */
00457   fclose(status->fd);
00458 
00459   /*
00460     if(status->header.numFrames > 0)
00461     free(status->frames);
00462   */
00463   status->header.numFrames = 0;
00464   
00465   return(0);
00466 }
